column2:
valid_survey |>
  mutate(gender_stated = case_when(q2_a == 1 ~ "Female",
                                    q2_b == 1 ~ "Male"),
         gender_class = case_when(gender_women == 1 ~ "Female",
                                   gender_men == 1 ~ "Male")) |>
  xtabs(formula=~gender_class + gender_stated)
